Package com.paiondata.aristotle.repository

Interface UserRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<User,Long>, org.springframework.data.neo4j.repository.Neo4jRepository<User,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<User,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<User>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<User,Long>
@Repository public interface UserRepository extends org.springframework.data.neo4j.repository.Neo4jRepository<User,Long>
Repository interface for managing users using Neo4j. This interface provides methods for CRUD operations on users and their relationships.

  • Method Details

    • getUserByUidcid

      @Query("MATCH (u:User { uidcid: $uidcid }) RETURN u") User getUserByUidcid(String uidcid)
      Retrieves a user by their unique identifier (UID/CID).
      Parameters:
      uidcid - the unique identifier of the user
      Returns:
      the user

    • findAll

      @Query("MATCH (u:User) RETURN u") List<User> findAll()
      Retrieves all users.
      Specified by:
      findAll in interface org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<User,Long>
      Specified by:
      findAll in interface org.springframework.data.neo4j.repository.Neo4jRepository<User,Long>
      Returns:
      a list of all users

    • checkUidcidExists

      @Query("MATCH (u:User { uidcid: $uidcid }) RETURN count(u)") long checkUidcidExists(String uidcid)
      Checks if a user with the given UID/CID exists.
      Parameters:
      uidcid - the unique identifier of the user
      Returns:
      the count of users with the given UID/CID

    • createUser

      @Query("CREATE (u:User { uidcid: $uidcid, nick_name: $nickName }) RETURN u") User createUser(@Param("uidcid") String uidcid, @Param("nickName") String nickName)
      Creates a new user.
      Parameters:
      uidcid - the unique identifier of the user
      nickName - the nickname of the user
      Returns:
      the created user

    • updateUser

      @Query("MATCH (u:User { uidcid: $uidcid }) SET u.nick_name = $nickName RETURN u") User updateUser(@Param("uidcid") String uidcid, @Param("nickName") String nickName)
      Updates the nickname of a user.
      Parameters:
      uidcid - the unique identifier of the user
      nickName - the new nickname of the user
      Returns:
      the updated user

    • deleteByUidcids

      @Query("MATCH (u:User) WHERE u.uidcid IN $uidcids DETACH DELETE u") void deleteByUidcids(List<String> uidcids)
      Deletes users by their UID/CIDs.
      Parameters:
      uidcids - the list of UID/CIDs of the users to be deleted

    • getGraphUuidsByUserUidcid

      @Query("MATCH (u:User) WHERE u.uidcid IN $uidcids WITH u MATCH (u)-[r:RELATION]->(g:Graph) RETURN g.uuid") List<String> getGraphUuidsByUserUidcid(List<String> uidcids)
      Retrieves the UUIDs of graphs associated with the given users.
      Parameters:
      uidcids - the list of UID/CIDs of the users
      Returns:
      the list of UUIDs of the graphs
